    Function reference

    All functions

    CC_GenePrefetch()
    Prefetch cycle gene
    CellScoring()
    Cell classification
    ClassDimPlot()
    2D-Dimensional reduction plot for classification.
    ClassDimPlot3D()
    3D-Dimensional reduction plot for cell classification visualization.
    ClassStatPlot()
    Statistical plot of cell classification
    DefaultReduction()
    Find the default reduction name in the srt object.
    DynamicHeatmap()
    Heatmap plot for dynamic genes along lineages
    DynamicPlot()
    Plot for dynamic features along lineages.
    EnrichmentPlot()
    EnrichmentPlot
    ExpCorPlot()
    Features correlation plot
    ExpDimPlot()
    Dimensional reduction plot for expression.
    ExpDimPlot3D()
    3D-Dimensional reduction plot for gene expression visualization.
    ExpDotPlot()
    ExpDotPlot
    ExpHeatmapPlot()
    ExpHeatmapPlot
    ExpVlnPlot()
    Violin plot for cell expression.
    FetchH5()
    Fetch data from the hdf5 file
    GSEAPlot()
    GSEA Plot
    GeneConvert()
    Gene ID conversion function using biomart
    Integration_SCP()
    Integration_SCP
    PAGAPlot()
    PAGA plot
    PrepareEnrichmentDB()
    Prepare the database for enrichment analysis
    PrepareSCExplorer()
    Prepare Seurat object data for the SCExplorer into hdf5 file
    ProjectionPlot()
    Projection Plot
    RunCSSMap()
    Single-cell reference mapping with CSS method
    RunCellQC()
    Run cell-level quality control for single cell RNA-seq data.
    RunDEtest()
    Differential gene test
    RunDM()
    Run DiffusionMap(DM)
    RunDoubletCalling()
    Run doublet-calling for single cell RNA-seq data.
    RunDynamicEnrichment()
    RunDynamicEnrichment
    RunDynamicFeatures()
    RunDynamicFeatures
    RunEnrichment()
    Perform the enrichment analysis(over-representation) on the genes
    RunGSEA()
    Perform the enrichment analysis(GSEA) on the genes
    RunHarmony2()
    Harmony single cell integration
    RunKNNMap()
    Single-cell reference mapping with KNN method
    RunKNNPredict()
    Annotate single cells using similarity.
    RunMDS()
    Run multi-dimensional scaling(MDS)
    RunNMF()
    Run Non-negative matrix factorization(NMF)
    RunPAGA()
    Run PAGA analysis
    RunPCAMap()
    Single-cell reference mapping with PCA method
    RunPalantir()
    Run Palantir analysis
    RunSCExplorer()

    Annotate single cells using scmap.

    Velocity Plot
    adata_to_srt()
    Convert an anndata object to a seurat object using reticulate
    compute_velocity_on_grid()
    Compute velocity on grid The original python code is on https://github.com/theislab/scvelo/blob/master/scvelo/plotting/velocity_embedding_grid.py
    db_DoubletDetection()
    Run doublet-calling with DoubletDetection
    db_Scrublet()
    Run doublet-calling with Scrublet
    db_scDblFinder()
    Run doublet-calling with scDblFinder

    Run doublet-calling with scds
    isOutlier()
    Detect outliers using MAD(Median and Median Absolute Deviation) method

    SCP palette
    panel_fix()
    Set the panel width/height of a ggplot to a fixed value.
    segementsDf()
    Shorten and offset the segment

    Convert a seurat object to an anndata object using reticulate
